UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Selection and redesign for high selectivity of membrane-active antimicrobial peptides from a dedicated sequence/function database.
Literature.Author: Roncević T, Vukicevic D, Krce L, Benincasa M, Aviani I, Maravic A, Tossi A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MBC=32µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=16-32µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=32µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=16µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MBC=16µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=8µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MBC=8-16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=64µM)
